entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nahanni Butte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yohin Lake 12:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: -19.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -22.5°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
